update.description:
Have all child config widgets emit signals when their values are edited by the user.

Currently this is only possible for enum child widgets, this pull request extends it for all other supported types.

I'm using this on the new joint creation tool for M2.

This will probably also be useful for undo.
update.title: Config widget signals

content.raw: Is the for loop needed to reverse look up the scoped name of the widget in the map? Maybe we can add a variable to `ConfigChildWidget` to store it's scoped name (probably set that in `AddConfigChildWidget`) so we can retrieve it here?
content.html: Is the for loop needed to reverse look up the scoped name of the widget in the map? Maybe we can add a variable to ConfigChildWidget to store it's scoped name (probably set that in AddConfigChildWidget) so we can retrieve it here?

content.raw:
[no gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/639/) has a couple of cppcheck warnings which should be fixed since 9596127. New [build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/641/) clean.

[gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/485/) also only has the warnings

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/495/) ok

[coverage](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI coverage jobs/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/352) doesn't run the ConfigWidget test...
content.html:
no gpu has a couple of cppcheck warnings which should be fixed since 9596127. New build clean.

gpu also only has the warnings

homebrew ok

coverage doesn't run the ConfigWidget test...
